summary:
Welcome to my profile! 
My strength is in connecting. Connecting people and goals, bringing the right parties together and creating sustainable long-term relationships.
I am a natural born organizer with “giraffe view” and eye for detail. Creative events producer with passion for organization, people and communication.
As a global citizen with 15+ years of experience in international companies, managing internal and corporate B2B events, I developed a deep understanding of how to bring different cultures together.
USPs:
- Combination of technical background and wide commercial experience and education.
- Strong in combination of creative-organisation-communicative
- Language Package: Dutch / English / Ukrainian (native) / Russian (native)
Tel: 0616842282 E-mail: elena.bragar@gmail.com

awards.title: RusPrix Award 2015
awards.description:
FDRL (Foundation Dutch Russian Livestock) was awarded by the Organising Committee of the RusPrix Award for its contribution in development of bilateral cooperation between Russia and the Netherlands in the sphere of agriculture.
The RusPrix Award is conducted under the patronage of Embassy of Russian Federation to The Netherlands. The Organizing Committee is represented by the Russian Embassy in the Netherlands, the Netherlands-Russian Centre for Trade Promotion (NRCH) and the Russian Chamber of Commerce and Industry.
The main aim of the RusPrix Award is the encouragement of Dutch companies, public organizations and individuals of politics and culture, whom achieved exceeding results in the development of business- and cultural relations with the Russian Federation. Establishment of the RusPrix Award in 2005 has shown major improvement in the investment climate of Russia and helped to attract attention of the Dutch government and business-elite for the positive development of economic and cultural cooperation between the two countries. It has also demonstrated mutual interest in such cooperation.
As Event Manager of the Coordination Centre of FDRL I am honored that my personal contribution to organisation of the FDRL activities is also a part of this achievement.

awards.title: Top 25 Revenue Achievement By a Firm
awards.description: European Staff (Russian branch, former RKC) is endorced for Top 25 Revenue Achievement By a Firm during an Annual Conference of the NPA on 6-8th of March 2014 in New Orelans, USA

projects.title: Companiies on Tour 2015. Tatarstan, Russian Federation
projects.description:
Riding the Waves of Culture
The 2015 Annual Business Mission of FDRL took its participants as far as the Republic of Tatarstan in the Russian Federation. On kind invitation of RACIN, the Investment and Innovations Department of the Ministry of Agriculture, the group of 12 FDRL representatives travelled to Kazan on the week of 7 -11 September. Through the varied and intensive program of business tour, which included farm visits, B2B sessions and meetings with local authorities, the Dutch delegation learned about current state of agricultural sector and ambitious future projects in the area of livestock and poultry production. Every meeting closed with a “cup of tea” and tableful of ethnic treats, as is right and proper according to Russian tradition. The warm hospitality of Tatarstan has left an unforgettable impression on Dutch delegation and has shown that establishing contacts and building long-lasting relationships and plays most significant role in doing business in this country.
In this frame the representatives of the European Staff, playing the role of the Coordination Centre of FDRL, have done a tremendous job putting all connections together, making the execution of the mission program productive and successful.

projects.title: Coordination Centre of Foundation Dutch-Russian Livestock
projects.description:
The Foundation ‘Dutch-Russian Livestock’, founded at 11 September 2009, is a continuation of the Foundation ‘Development Russian Dairy Sector’, which was founded in 2005. 
The objective of the Foundation is improvement of opportunities on the Russian export market for their members. Besides, the Foundation will be a negotiating partner of the Agricultural Ministries of the Russian Federation and the Netherlands, on agriculture policy, looking after the interest of her members. 
As from june 2014 European Staff has agreed to execute a rol of the Coordination Centre for FDRL. The main activities include:
-	Regular secretarial work, improved communication and coordination of activities between the members of FDRL
-	Project organization and coordination of events, meetings and other internal and external activities
-	Business Development of FDRL and its network on the Russian Market and attracting of new members
-	Reconstruction and improvement of the website of FDRL, promotion through social media and other digital sources
-	Brand development of FDRL brand

profile_positions.description:
Binnen IV Uitkeren wordt in Agile teams gewerkt om een bijdrage te leveren aan de (voornamelijk) digitale veranderingen in de organisatie. Als Scrummaster ben ik een teamlid van de beide scrumteams die de Medewerker applicatie ontwikkelen. Deze applicatie is het primaire systeem voor de verwerking van signalen door uitvoering van de Werkloosheidswet (WW). De twee scrumteams zijn verantwoordelijk voor het verder ontwikkelen en onderhouden van de applicatie.

Als scrummaster ben ik dé persoon die de teams helpt optimaal te presteren en zorg draag dat de teams zich blijven ontwikkelen. Ik houd me bezig met het coördineren en het verder ontwikkelen van het Agile gedachtegoed en toepassen van de Scrum werkwijze in het team. Ik ondersteun de teams in de dagelijkse werkzaamheden door belemmeringen weg te nemen en zet me in om de samenwerking te bevorderen. Ik coacht beide teams en/of de individuele teamleden in hun ontwikkeling. Het coachen op de volwassenheid van een team is een belangrijk onderdeel van mijn werkzaamheden.

Ik werk nauw samen met de Product Owner, de leden uit het team en de Teammanager.

 

Werkzaamheden:
• Scrummaster coördineert en faciliteert de teams in de juiste toepassing van de Scrum methode.
• Scrummaster bewaakt en ontwikkelt het gedachtegoed van Scrum en Agile binnen de teams en daarbuiten.
• Scrummaster ondersteunt leden van de teams in het uitvoeren van hun werkzaamheden.
• Scrummaster voorkomt zoveel mogelijk belemmeringen samen met betrokkenen binnen en buiten de teams. Waar belemmeringen alsnog optreden, zorgt de Scrummaster (mede) voor dat ze weggenomen worden.
• Scrummaster zet zich in om de samenwerking te verbeteren.
• Scrummaster coacht de teams en de individuele teamleden om zich verder te ontwikkelen.
profile_positions.title: Scrummaster

profile_positions.description:
As Domain Secretary of a domain “Life Long Development” within the UWV work company, I am a member of the core team and play an important role in the establishment of the domain.
LLO is a new domain (officially started in april 2021) that is responsible for the development and implementation of services and instruments aimed at the use of training, practical learning, and competence tests for the (potential)working population.

UWV stands for Employee Insurance Agency. It ensures a professional and efficient implementation of employee insurance, such as the WW, WIA, WAO, WAZ, Wazo and Sickness Benefits Act. UWV also offers labor market and data services.It performs these services as an independent administrative body (ZBO) on behalf of the Ministry of Social Affairs and Employment. 

Qualities and responsibilities: helicopter view; the spider in the web; to give solicited and unsolicited advice and explanation; identifying, analyzing, and providing insight into information; find a connection with the right key players; conduct preliminary investigations based on user wishes; content preparation, organization, planning of meetings, and much more!
profile_positions.title: Domain Secretary

profile_positions.description:
Organisation, preparation and hosting of webinars for the platform members (up to 100 participants per event).
As a volunteer at JobOn, the platform for job seekers in the Netherlands, I would like to gain new knowledge and experience for the next step in my career as Project Manager Events and help other job seekers who are also looking for a new challenge during these turbulent times.
I am a natural born organizer with a "giraffe view" and an eye for detail, with passion for events, people and communication. My combination of technical insight, creative approach and trust in my feeling help me to make every project a success!

profile_positions.title: Sales Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Event Manager FDRL (Foundation Dutch-Russian Livestock)
For the network of companies-members of FDRL (20) executing communication
and coordination of internal and external activities. Project management of
events, meetings, participation on international trade shows. Business
Development of FDRL and its network on the Russian and European markets,
attracting new members. Managing of the website of FDRL, Linkedin, Twitter,
writing and publication of announcements on the social media.

Foundation of Dutch Russian Livestock, that was found in 2009, is a group of 20 Dutch leading companies that act properly in the Russian trade market in the sector of dairy livestock and pig breeding and offer a wide range of services. Being in cooperation, the companies members of the Foundation offer all necessary facilities for the development of successful projects in livestock and pig breeding sectors: equipment, examination and animals. From the fields to the consumer, from the grain to the released meat product.
The objective of the Foundation is improvement of opportunities on the Russian speaking export market for their members. Besides, the Foundation is a negotiating partner between the Agricultural Ministries of the Russian Federation and the Netherlands, on agriculture policy, looking after the interest of her members.
profile_positions.title: Event Manager FDRL

profile_positions.description:
Combination of several jobs in 1 position: 

-Project Leader
Coordinating a project for creation of an e-platform for selling sugar in containers online. Coordinating and communicating with internal and external counterparties of the project, bringing the modules together.

-PAD coordinator (Proof of arrival at destination). 
Coordinating of export program of EU sugar. Communicating with buyers world wide in order to obtain proof of arrival at destination. - Expertise in import customs formalities worldwide.Presentation of gathered import documents from destinations to the EU Commission.

-Webmaster/editor intranet Sugar BU
Developing and managing the Sugar BU homepage. Organization, leading and communicating  the editorial team (representatives of 12 geographical locations of the Sugar BU).

-Event manager corporate events
Organization of events within the Sugar Business Unit. Presentationts, seminars, customer events. Annual events of Amsterdam department. 

-Internal Communication Project: Graduation project for Internal Communications in Sugar BU. Research and advice to the Sugar BU management board on improvement of the internal communication in the frame of annual Employee Engagement Survey.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager / Communications and Events
